user_question: How can I make a sourdough starter from scratch and generate an image of a freshly baked sourdough loaf?
final_answer: To make a sourdough starter: Day 1: Mix 1 cup whole wheat flour with 1/2 cup water. Day 2-5: Discard half and feed with 1 cup all-purpose flour and 1/2 cup water daily. Image of a freshly baked sourdough loaf generated. The best temperature to keep the starter during fermentation is between 70°F and 75°F (21°C and 24°C).
